医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新计算器可预测静脉中风后的癫痫风险哥德堡大学和其他大学的一项研究提出了一种实用的计算器，可以预测静脉中风后癫痫的风险。目的是改善对受影响者（主要是年轻人）的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/New-calculator-predicts-epilepsy-risk-after-venous-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/New-calculator-predicts-epilepsy-risk-after-venous-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54c2f8c6-1bd4-408d-97a4-79133bfb5cda Tue, 12 Nov 2024 07:55:44 -0500 New calculator predicts epilepsy risk after venous stroke
从吸烟转向电子烟可改善呼吸系统健康牛津大学出版社在《尼古丁和烟草研究》上发表的一篇新论文发现，从吸烟转向电子烟的人的呼吸道健康状况有所改善，但在继续吸普通香烟的同时开始吸电子烟的人并没有报告呼吸道症状有所改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Switching-from-smoking-to-vaping-improves-respiratory-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Switching-from-smoking-to-vaping-improves-respiratory-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1b004bd-2bc0-43ae-b58d-7aedd5818d1c Tue, 12 Nov 2024 07:45:57 -0500 Switching from smoking to vaping improves respiratory health
一位父亲从应急响应到纽约大学朗格健康中心的职业生涯五年前，乔纳森·内格伦 (Jonathan Negron) 在一架商业航班上听到的尖叫声最终标志着他进入纽约大学朗格健康中心 (NYU Langone Health) 的职业生涯，他的灵感来自于对女儿极为罕见的病症的快速诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/A-fathers-journey-from-emergency-response-to-a-career-at-NYU-Langone-Health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/A-fathers-journey-from-emergency-response-to-a-career-at-NYU-Langone-Health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd4320e2-bd30-4baf-bd9b-fcaa4f590550 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 07:42:53 -0500 A father's journey from emergency response to a career at NYU Langone Health
每周额外运动一小时可降低心房颤动的风险一项新的研究显示，每周增加一小时的体力活动可能会将最常见类型的心律失常（心律失常）的发生率降低 11%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Extra-hour-of-weekly-exercise-reduces-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Extra-hour-of-weekly-exercise-reduces-risk-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e289fc1-9421-4085-b4ed-c695dace7cd7 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 07:33:44 -0500 Extra hour of weekly exercise reduces risk of atrial fibrillation
Stand Up To Cancer 与强生公司合作探索 AL 淀粉样变性的新疗法Stand Up To Cancer (SU2C) 今天宣布与强生公司合作，旨在支持研究测试两种靶向疗法（teclistamab 和 daratumumab）的组合，以治疗一种名为 AL 淀粉样变性的罕见疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Stand-Up-To-Cancer-partners-with-Johnson-Johnson-to-explore-new-treatment-for-AL-amyloidosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Stand-Up-To-Cancer-partners-with-Johnson-Johnson-to-explore-new-treatment-for-AL-amyloidosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ed0f76e-548d-4fed-bba7-9d9263d9a73f Tue, 12 Nov 2024 07:29:09 -0500 Stand Up To Cancer partners with Johnson & Johnson to explore new treatment for AL amyloidosis
研究确定了减少精神科药物研究的关键优先事项研究希望为研究议程提供信息，并帮助未来的研究重点关注对关键利益相关者最重要的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Study-identizes-key-priorities-for-research-on-reducing-psychiatric-medication.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Study-identizes-key-priorities-for-research-on-reducing-psychiatric-medication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f976332-8e5a-45f0-9764-1111757eb112 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 07:21:23 -0500 Study identifies key priorities for research on reducing psychiatric medication
Nomic® 和 Parker 癌症免疫治疗研究所 (PICI) 启动大规模蛋白质分析，以研究 RADIOHEAD 研究中的免疫治疗反应Nomic Bio 和 PICI 合作量化癌症免疫治疗中的蛋白质生物标志物，增强对患者反应和治疗耐药性的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Nomicc2ae-and-Parker-Institute-for-Cancer-Immunotherapy-(PICI)-launch-large-scale- Protein-profiling-to-investigate-immunotherapy-响应-RADIOHEAD-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Nomicc2ae-and-Parker-Institute-for-Cancer-Immunotherapy-(PICI)-launch-large-scale- Protein-profiling-to-investigate-immunotherapy-响应-in-RADIOHEAD-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c29ba46e-546a-493c-8e45-ee58f3dced1e Tue, 12 Nov 2024 07:12:00 -0500 Nomic® and Parker Institute for Cancer Immunotherapy (PICI) launch large-scale protein profiling to investigate immunotherapy responses in RADIOHEAD study
科学家发现了一种以前未被认识的肿瘤抑制机制人体中有一些过程可以抑制癌细胞的生长和增殖。这些机制，包括涉及肿瘤抑制蛋白 p53 的机制，因其在疾病中的关键作用而受到广泛研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Scientists-uncover-a-previously-unrecognized-tumor-suppression-mechanism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Scientists-uncover-a-previously-unrecognized-tumor-suppression-mechanism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ce320c1-bf92-4574-9ec6-195ee6d1b0fb Tue, 12 Nov 2024 06:28:00 -0500 Scientists uncover a previously unrecognized tumor suppression mechanism
患者来源的类器官：改变癌症研究和个性化医疗患者来源的类器官 (PDO) 正在彻底改变癌症研究，通过先进的 3D 建模技术增强药物测试和个性化治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Patient-driven-organoids-Transforming-cancer-research-and-personalized-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Patient-driven-organoids-Transforming-cancer-research-and-personalized-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03a63c35-598d-4628-86f5-5c5c548fc666 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 06:28:00 -0500 Patient-derived organoids: Transforming cancer research and personalized medicine
流行病压力与饮酒量长期增加有关根据南加州大学 Keck Medicine 今天发表在《内科医学年鉴》上的一项具有全国代表性的大型研究显示，在 COVID-19 大流行期间，酒精使用量有所增加，甚至在大流行结束后仍然保持较高水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Pandemic-stress-linked-to-long-term-rise-in-alcohol-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241112/Pandemic-stress-linked-to-long-term-rise-in-alcohol-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3705691b-4a12-4028-ac10-d665f5285fb4 Tue, 12 Nov 2024 06:21:00 -0500 Pandemic stress linked to long-term rise in alcohol consumption
